name: Golden Glazed Chicken Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Golden Glazed Chicken Recipe: Chicken 1 kg whole Sesame seeds roasted 2 tsp Soya sauce 3 tsp Oil 3 tbsp Honey 2 tbsp Lemon juice 2 tbsp Ginger garlic 1 tbsp Chili powder 1 tsp heaped Salt 1 ½ tsp Crushed black pepper ½ tsp Orange color pinch Ketchup 2 tbsp Chili garlic sauce 3 tbsp
instructions: Prick chicken well, marinate with all the ingredients for 2 hours, put chicken on a baking tray, bake on 180 degree C for 30 minutes, sprinkle sesame seeds on chicken before serving, serve garnish with finely chopped parsley.
